Comments_List: This class expanded on my knowledge of biochemistry with a more rigorous focus on methods and complex regulatory processes. I also enjoyed the opportunity to analyze papers in discussion section as well as write a research proposal on a novel topic.

The material in this course was very interesting, and the exams were both thorough and fair. The literature chosen for discussion did a good job of complementing the lectures, and the lecturers were all very good. I don't see any weaknesses in this course.

I would definitely recommend this course to another student. This class is definitely designed for graduate students, but it is very accommodating of undergrads, and the material picks right up where 301 leaves off. If you enjoyed 301, then you will probably really like this class too.
